title: Scrub Meadow
description: A grassy meadow punctuated by shrub and scrub. The grasses range in height from less than a meter to nearly two meters tall in places. Small shrubs and stunted trees poke out of the grasses sporadically. Wildflowers grow among the grasses. The land is gently sloped down to the north, gently sloped up to the east, gently sloped up to the south, gently sloped up to the west.
